name: Beast Slayer Origin
storyline: In the heart of Eldorath the land are divided into five distint regions, each filled with its own untamed creatures and ancients wonders. But harmony, long held in balance, is about to be shattered. A prophecy echoes across the land, one strong beast, unlike any before it, is awakening. It's power will disrupt the ecosystem, creating chaos for every living creatures. The beast, known only as the "Pillar Devourer" stirs from it slumber. Its awakening will unmake the delicate balance that has existed for centuries. To confront the growing threat, a group of brave citiziens came together. They formed the Beast Slayer, a global syndicate dedicated to protecting the continent's ecosystems, from the destruction caused by this awakening force. Each Slayer, chosen for their skill and knowledge, is tasked with hunting and neutralizing the beats that are now raging across the land, destabilizing nature's fragile order. wherever the Pillar Devourer influence spreads, the beast grown more dangerous, turning even the most peaceful creatures into ferocious predators. The task before the Beast Slayer is daunting. No one can stand alone against the forces of nature, but together, they may have chance to prevent the world from being consumed by the growing chaos. The fate of Eldorath rests in your hands. Will you rise to become Beast Slayer, ane restore balance to a world on the brink of destruction?
summary: Embark on an epic journey of revenge and redemption in Beast Slayer, a game inspired by the thrill of Monster Hunter and the strategic depth of classic Final Fantasy titles. Your once peaceful town has been decimated by a fearsome beast, setting you on a path of vengeance. Saved by a slayer, you now aim to become a Master Slayer yourself.
